recurring.delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This will not affect expenses that have already been generated.
recurring.empty_message: Add recurring expenses like rent, subscriptions, or monthly bills to automatically track them.
recurring.info_message: Recurring expenses are automatically generated on their due dates when you open the app. Active templates will create new expenses, while paused templates won't generate anything until you activate them again.

data_collection.consent_message:
To provide better AI-powered expense categorization, we collect anonymous usage data.

What we collect:
• Input text and amounts
• Categories and corrections
• Language preferences

What we DON'T collect:
• Personal information
• Names or contacts
• Location data

This helps train better AI models for everyone.
